a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: People living in democracies and non-democracies, World

Based on the
classification
and estimates by Boix et al. (2013). Democracies are understood here as political
systems in which political leaders are elected under broad rights for men to vote in free and fair elections.
Data source: Boix-Miller-Rosato (2022); Population based on various sources (2023)
